meanings.sent1: The library is open to nonstudents as well.
meanings.sent2: The park was filled with nonstudents enjoying the sunny day.
meanings.sent3: The nonstudents at the coffee shop were discussing their favorite books.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were bustling with nonstudents, each with their own unique story.
meanings.sent5: The event welcomed nonstudents from all walks of life.

meanings.definition: Those who do not attend school.
meanings.sent1: Nonstudents often pursue alternative forms of education.
meanings.sent2: The playground was empty, as all the children were nonstudents.
meanings.sent3: The nonstudents in the neighborhood organized a fun outdoor game.
meanings.sent4: The forest was a classroom for the nonstudents, teaching them about nature.
meanings.sent5: The museum offered special programs for nonstudents interested in learning.
